languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Омниссия велит набожному уму стремиться к раскрытию истины. Посему я не остановлюсь, пока не отыщу своего наставника и не пойму, как сей слуга Бога-Машины связан с ним. Я запрашиваю привилегию присоединиться к вашей свите в качестве полноправного спутника. Готов исполнять роль {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g} на вашем корабле в обмен на право следовать за вами и вести собственное расследование".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, Омниссия велит набожному уму стремиться к раскрытию истины. Посему я не остановлюсь, пока не отыщу своего наставника и не пойму, как сей слуга Бога-Машины связан с ним. Я запрашиваю привилегию присоединиться к вашей свите в качестве полноправного спутника. Готов исполнять роль {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g} на вашем корабле в обмен на право следовать за вами и вести собственное расследование".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Омниссия велит набожному уму стремиться к раскрытию истины. Посему я не остановлюсь, пока не отыщу своего наставника и не пойму, как сей слуга Бога-Машины связан с ним. Я запрашиваю привилегию присоединиться к вашей свите в качестве полноправного спутника. Готов исполнять роль {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g} на вашем корабле в обмен на право следовать за вами и вести собственное расследование".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive towards uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue in the full capacity of a companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

"Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

"Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

"Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der Omnissiah befiehlt einem frommen Verstand, zur Offenlegung der Wahrheit zu streben. Ich werde daher nicht ruhen, ehe ich meinen Mentor gefunden und seine Verbindung zu diesem Diener des Maschinengotts verstanden habe. Ich erbitte das Privileg, mich Eurem Gefolge als rechtmäßiger Gefährte anzuschließen. Ich kann Euch für das Recht, Euch zu folgen und meine eigenen Nachforschungen anzustellen, auch etwas anbieten: Ich kann auf Eurem Schiff die Pflichten eines {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinensehers{/g} ausüben."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, der Omnissiah befiehlt einem frommen Verstand, zur Offenlegung der Wahrheit zu streben. Ich werde daher nicht ruhen, ehe ich meinen Mentor gefunden und seine Verbindung zu diesem Diener des Maschinengotts verstanden habe. Ich erbitte das Privileg, mich Eurem Gefolge als rechtmäßiger Gefährte anzuschließen. Ich kann Euch für das Recht, Euch zu folgen und meine eigenen Nachforschungen anzustellen, auch etwas anbieten: Ich kann auf Eurem Schiff die Pflichten eines {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinensehers{/g} ausüben."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, l'Omnimessie exige qu'un esprit pieux se dévoue pour découvrir la vérité et c'est pourquoi je n'aurai de cesse de rechercher mon mentor afin de comprendre son rapport avec ce serviteur du Dieu-Machine. Je demande de rejoindre votre entourage en tant que fidèle compagnon. Je peux vous proposer mes qualités de {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g} sur votre vaisseau, en échange du droit de vous suivre et de mener ma propre enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, l'Omnimessie exige qu'un esprit pieux se dévoue pour découvrir la vérité et c'est pourquoi je n'aurai de cesse de rechercher mon mentor afin de comprendre son rapport avec ce serviteur du Dieu-Machine. Je demande de rejoindre votre entourage en tant que fidèle compagnon. Je peux vous proposer mes qualités de {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g} sur votre vaisseau, en échange du droit de vous suivre et de mener ma propre enquête. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，欧姆尼塞亚为这个虔诚的灵魂下令，要求他努力揭开真相。我需要找到我的导师，理清他与万机之神仆人之间有什么联系。在实现这个目标之前，我绝不会停下脚步。我请求作为合法的同伴，加入你的随行人员之中。我可以在你的船上担任{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}的职务，以此换取随你一起寻求真相的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，欧姆尼塞亚为这个虔诚的灵魂下令，要求他努力揭开真相。我需要找到我的导师，理清他与万机之神仆人之间有什么联系。在实现这个目标之前，我绝不会停下脚步。我请求作为合法的同伴，加入你的随行人员之中。我可以在你的船上担任{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}的职务，以此换取随你一起寻求真相的权利。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、万機神は努力して真実を明らかにしろと信心深い精神に命じるのです。したがって、師を見つけ、この機械神の従者と師のつながりが分かるまで、自分は立ち止まりません。正式な仲間としてあなたの従者の一員になる権利を要求します。陛下の船で{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}として従事する代わりに、同行して調査を行う権利をいただきたい」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、万機神は努力して真実を明らかにしろと新人深い心に命じるのだ。したがって、我が師を見つけ、この機械神の従者と師のつながりが分かるまで、私は立ち止まらない。正式な仲間としてあなたの従者の一員になる権利を要求する。あなたの船で{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}として従事する代わりに、あなたに付いて行って私の調査を行う権利をいただきたい」

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el Omnissiah ordena a una mente piadosa que se esfuerce por descubrir la verdad. Por lo tanto, no pararé hasta encontrar a mi mentor y comprender su conexión con este sirviente del Dios Máquina. Solicito el privilegio de unirme a su séquito como legítimo compañero. Puedo ofrecerme a cumplir las tareas de {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g} en su nave a cambio del derecho a seguirle y llevar a cabo mi propia investigación».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el Omnissiah ordena a una mente piadosa que se esfuerce por descubrir la verdad. Por lo tanto, no pararé hasta encontrar a mi mentor y comprender su conexión con este sirviente del Dios Máquina. Solicito el privilegio de unirme a su séquito como legítimo compañero. Puedo ofrecerme a cumplir las tareas de {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g} en su nave a cambio del derecho a seguirle y llevar a cabo mi propia investigación».

languages.text: "Hermesih, takva sahibi bir zihnin hakikati ortaya çıkarmak için çabalamasını buyurur Lord Kaptan. Bu yüzden yönderimi bulup onun bu Makine Tanrı hizmetkârıyla bağlantısını anlayana kadar durmayacağım. Maiyetinize meşru bir yoldaş olarak katılma ayrıcalığını talep ediyorum. Sizinle seyahat edip araştırmama devam etmem karşılığında geminizde {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Mühedyumluk{/g} vazifesi yürütmeyi teklif ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Omnissiah commands a pious mind to strive toward uncovering the truth. Therefore I will not stop until I find my mentor and understand his connection to this servant of the Machine God. I request the privilege of joining your retinue as a rightful companion. I can offer to fulfil the duties of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} on your ship in exchange for the right to follow you and conduct my own investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih, takva sahibi birinin hakikati ortaya çıkarmaya çalışmasını buyurdu Lord Kaptan. Bu yüzden mentorumu bulup onun, bu Makine Tanrı hizmetkârıyla bağlantısını anlayana kadar durmayacağım. Maiyetinize meşru bir yoldaş olarak katılma ayrıcalığını talep ediyorum. Sizinle seyahat edip kendi araştırmama devam etmem karşılığında geminizde bir {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}mühedyum{/g}un görevlerini yerine getirmeyi teklif ediyorum."
